project_plan.name: Temperature Converter Command-Line Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool for converting temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement command-line interface to accept user input for temperature and desired output unit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure functionality is correct
